item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. NKRYPT Sculpture (112 points | 3 comments)
2. Xkcd 1425 (Tasks) turns ten years old today (818 points | 375 comments)
3. AWS Nitro Enclaves: Attack Surface (75 points | 10 comments)
4. Italian Music Through the Lens of Complex Networks (67 points | 6 comments)
5. DoNotPay has to pay $193K for falsely touting untested AI lawyer, FTC says (98 points | 85 comments)
6. Flexport Is Hiring a Staff Product Designer in SF ( | hide)
7. Orion, our first true augmented reality glasses (1117 points | 902 comments)
8. OpenAI to Become For-Profit Company (684 points | 375 comments)
9. Llama 3.2: Revolutionizing edge AI and vision with open, customizable models (808 points | 272 comments)
10. The Mathematics of Dobble (2018) (14 points | 2 comments)
11. Show HN: Cronexpr, a Rust library to parse and iter crontab expression (122 points | 21 comments)
12. Git-absorb: Git commit –fixup, but automatic (360 points | 194 comments)
13. Algorithms for the 21st Century (2006) (7 points | 1 comment)
14. LAPD raid goes from bad to farce after gun allegedly sucked onto MRI machine (7 points | 3 comments)
15. Hoodmaps: Publicly Annotated City Maps (128 points | 64 comments)
16. Launch HN: Haystack (YC S24) – Visualize and edit code on an infinite canvas (296 points | 163 comments)
17. PostgreSQL 17 (282 points | 50 comments)
18. Octopuses seen hunting together with fish, punching those that don't cooperate (191 points | 153 comments)
19. Eliminating Memory Safety Vulnerabilities at the Source (279 points | 129 comments)
20. Shizuku: App that lets you use system APIs with higher privileges without root (65 points | 24 comments)
21. Vehicles Could Be Hacked and Tracked Thanks to a Simple Website Bug (57 points | 33 comments)
22. Another new wasp species discovered by researchers (19 points | 11 comments)
23. The lost language extensions of MetaWare's High C compiler (2023) (286 points | 94 comments)
24. GitHub-events-viewer a.k.a. "What did I do yesterday?" (66 points | 18 comments)
25. Timeshare owner? The Mexican drug cartels want you (224 points | 261 comments)
26. Moerenuma Park: A Giant, Gorgeous 'Living Sculpture' in Hokkaido (47 points | 7 comments)
27. Show HN: Httpdbg – A tool to trace the HTTP requests sent by your Python code (176 points | 48 comments)
28. Writing Portable Rendering Code with Nvrhi (21 points | 3 comments)
29. How to avoid a BSOD on your 2B dollar spacecraft (164 points | 121 comments)
30. Why I still blog after 15 years (436 points | 213 comments)
